profileData.description: I am a professional on the IT field, able to adapt to different environments and work under pressure. Love working as a team in a way to achieve the goals of the company, always following the strategies and guidelines provided by the organization. During my professional career I have been able to develop mostly in the QA field where I have gone from some basic manual testing to some advanced automated testing. Currently I'm learning Cypress and going into more depth into Node.js and React.js.

employmentHistory.title: QA Automation Enginner
duties: Tracked, documented, and reported quality levels and perform analysis for quality improvement initiatives.
Created and maintained our automation framework using selenium with C# and Nunit.
Wrote, designed, and executed automated testcases by creating scripts that run tests automatically.
Determined the priority for test scenarios and create execution plans to implement these scenarios.
Tested different parts of the system including API using Postman tool.
Debugged and fixed errors in automated test scripts.
Served as mentor for other junior QAs within the team.
Performed tests to find bugs and report them as I encounter them.
Participated in Agile meetings (Daily standups, Restrospectives, Demos, Sprint Planning, Sprint Review, Backlog Refinement).
Integrated some automated tests that needed to run SQL scripts in SQL server as part of the setup.
Created and executed test plans for new features.
Setup the pipelines to be run in a automated manner using Jenkins jobs and Azure pipelines.

employmentHistory.title: Software Quality Assurance Engineer
duties: Story pointing of User Stories from QA perspective.
Performed routine inspections of finished products to check for defects and other problems before these products are shipped for distribution.
Tracked, documented, and reported quality levels and perform analysis for quality improvement initiatives.
Wrote clean automated scripts that test functionality using C# along with Selenium.
Conducted various tests for systems, networks, applications, databases, software.
Logged and documented errors in the tracking system (Jira).
Performed different kinds of testing including, Regression, Functional and Non-Functional tests, Smoke tests, Feature testing, etc.

employmentHistory.title: Software Quality Assurance Analyst
duties: Test Driven Development and regression testing.
Affirmed that software functions according to functional and user requirements.
Extended test frameworks and automated test sets using C# and Selenium.
Reported all defects in Jira.

employmentHistory.title: APPLICATION TECH SUPPORT
duties: Followed policies and procedures related to application methods and quality standards at all times.
Identified hardware and software solutions.
Troubleshooted technical issues.
Diagnosed and repaired faults.

educationHistory.degree: Web Development and Internet Applications Diploma
